messages.message: Hi, is there currently a behind the scenes way of reordering fields in a project? I’ve got a project with quite complex fields setup, and I need one before the other so I can clean using the data. At the moment the only way in the UI to do it is to delete them and recreate them in the correct order.

Being able to reorder fields looks like a useful feature. I've been through this many times. Another useful thing would be able to delete all documents uploaded to Converse, selecting all of them for deletion.

@fernando.piazza.ctr we have a ticket for the field reordering (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1147). But not one for the deleting of all docs in converse. If you think we need this, it’s best to open a feature request ticket here (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1147).
cc @CJ for status on field re-ordering
probably coming in 24.12; its taking a while because this involves a decent amount of backend changes
